revised_title: Obituary of Martinus Willem Beijerinck: A Pioneering Biologist
tldr: This obituary honors the life and work of Martinus Willem Beijerinck, a renowned Dutch botanist, microbiologist, and chemist. Beijerinck made significant contributions to the fields of plant galls, bacterial nutrition, and the tobacco mosaic disease. His work has left a lasting impact on the scientific community, and he is remembered as a pioneer in his field.
